title: Firefighter
data:
The **Firefighter** is a [role](/wiki/Role "Role") that first appeared in [NetHack-- 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack--_3.0.10 "NetHack-- 3.0.10"). It was dropped from the code at the time the [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") branch was ported over; the code can still be found within [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), and in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") the role reappears with a proper quest.

Firefighters can be lawful or neutral, and play as a human, dwarf, gnome, hobbit, or giant.

[ ]

## Skills

NetHack-- 3.0.10 was based on [NetHack 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10"), which predated the [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill") system, so Firefighters could use any weapons.

SLASHTHEM adjusts some of the Firefighter's weapon skills (notably restricting [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword"), [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger"), and [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife")):

| Firefighter skills |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Max                | Skills                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| Basic              | - *Weapons:* [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar"), [paddle](/wiki/Paddle "Paddle"), [morning star](/wiki/Morning_star "Morning star"), [flail](/wiki/Flail "Flail"), [hammer](/wiki/Hammer "Hammer"), [polearms](/wiki/Polearms "Polearms"), [whip](/wiki/Whip "Whip"), [unicorn horn](/wiki/Unicorn_horn "Unicorn horn")
- *Combat:* [two weapon combat](/wiki/Two_weapon_combat "Two weapon combat"), [bare hands](/wiki/Bare_hands "Bare hands") |
| Skilled            | * *Weapons:* [saber](/wiki/Saber "Saber"), [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace"), [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow"), [sling](/wiki/Sling "Sling"), [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow"), [dart](/wiki/Dart "Dart")
* *Combat:* [riding](/wiki/Riding "Riding")
* *Spells:* [protection](/wiki/Protection_spells "Protection spells"), [healing](/wiki/Healing_spells "Healing spells"), [matter](/wiki/Matter_spells "Matter spells")                                      |
| Expert             | - *Weapons:* [axe](/wiki/Axe "Axe"), [pick-axe](/wiki/Pick-axe "Pick-axe"), [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword"), [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword"), [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

The Firefighter's [special spell](/wiki/Special_spell "Special spell") is [teleport away](/wiki/Teleport_away "Teleport away"). Spell success is determined by [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence").

- SlashTHEM u\_init.c line 1288 in v. 0.8

## Intrinsics

- XL 10: [Searching](/wiki/Searching "Searching")
- XL 15: [Fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance")

## Starting equipment

- a +0 [axe](/wiki/Axe "Axe")
- 5 uncursed potions of [water](/wiki/Water "Water")
- 4 [scrolls of fire](/wiki/Scroll_of_fire "Scroll of fire")
- a [wand of fire](/wiki/Wand_of_fire "Wand of fire")
- a +0 [fire helmet](/wiki/Fire_helmet "Fire helmet")
- a +0 [asbestos jacket](/wiki/Asbestos_jacket "Asbestos jacket")

Firefighters start with a [pet](/wiki/Pet "Pet") [little dog](/wiki/Little_dog "Little dog").

## Rank titles

- XL 1-2: Water Boy/Girl
- XL 3-5: Fire Cadet
- XL 6-9: Rookie
- XL 10-13: Extinguisher
- XL 14-17: Smokeeater
- XL 18-21: Fire Captain
- XL 22-25: Platoon Chief
- XL 26-29: Division Commander
- XL 30: Fire Chief

SlashTHEM role.c line 511

## Quest

- *Main article: [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest")*

The [Firefighter quest](/wiki/Firefighter_quest "Firefighter quest") sees the Firefighter fighting [Eddie the Pyro](/index.php?title=Eddie_the_Pyro\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Eddie the Pyro (page does not exist)") for the [Fire Chief Helmet](/wiki/Fire_Chief_Helmet "Fire Chief Helmet"), a lawful [fire helmet](/wiki/Fire_helmet "Fire helmet") which grants [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage") and [half physical damage](/wiki/Half_physical_damage "Half physical damage") while carried, and [protection](/wiki/Protection "Protection") and [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning") while worn. It also can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") to summon a tame [water elemental](/wiki/Water_elemental "Water elemental"). The maps are copied from the defunct [Elf Quest](/index.php?title=Elf_Quest\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Elf Quest (page does not exist)").

- SlashTHEM artilist.h line 621

## Gods

The Firefighter's gods all relate to fire:

- Lawful: Prometheus
- Neutral: Thor
- Chaotic: Arson

## History

The Firefighter's first appearance was in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") precursor [NetHack-- 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack--_3.0.10 "NetHack-- 3.0.10"), as one of nine new roles in addition to the twelve in [the contemporary version of NetHack](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10"). The discussion thread in which the authors first announced the variant suggests that some of the new roles were taken from a list proposing a role for every letter of the alphabet. See [here](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.hack/jg8YtQX1M3Y/tbBlteXdYY8J) for the relevant post.

After the release of [NetHack 3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3") in 1993, NetHack-- was updated to [NetHack-- 3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack--_3.1.3 "NetHack-- 3.1.3") by porting some of the changes from NetHack-- 3.0.10 into a patch for the newest version. Due to some changes in the vanilla code, however, some content was removed to improve compatibility with NetHack; most significantly, NetHack 3.1 had seen the addition of the [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") branch. To avoid the challenge of fitting in full-length quests for the roles that had been added in NetHack-- 3.0.10, those roles were simply left out.

There is some evidence that the developer(s) of [SLASH](/wiki/SLASH "SLASH") may have wanted to bring back some of the roles, including the Firefighter, as the DAT folder for [SLASH 6](/wiki/SLASH_6 "SLASH 6") contains unused maps for quest levels for this and other roles that are not actually present in the version. The quest leader would have been "Chief", the nemesis a unique [elemental](/wiki/Elemental "Elemental") named Fire, and the quest artifact a fire helmet called the Fire Chief Helmet. The code for the maps indicates that the quest would feature numerous [salamanders](/wiki/Salamander "Salamander") and [efreeti](/wiki/Efreeti "Efreeti").

The Firefighter role, along with the other eight new roles in NetHack-- 3.0.10, was carried over with some tweaks into SlashTHEM.

## References

- NetHack-- 3.0.10 attrib.c line 58
- NetHack-- 3.0.10 u\_init.c line 222
